name: I.Cartel: Life of a Criminal
description:
I.Cartel is an Adventure-RPG simulation game that places you in the shoes of a former programmer who seeks to gain fortune from the world of drug smuggling. Every kingpin before you has been arrested or murdered. How will your story end?FEATURES
  • Become the next big criminal
  • Explore romances
  • Marry your chosen woman
  • Engage in politics, bribe or murder anyone who gets in your way, including the president.



    Year Advancement:
    Start your story from the age of 16 and grow from there.



    Control the world from the comfort of your desktop computer.

    Literally.
